hackathon-description-text: University of Miami Shalala Student Center Grand Ballrooms
hackathon-requirements: You can make anything you'd like! At the end of UHack, you will pitch your app, website, or whatever prototype you dreamed up, and compete for prizes! Hackathons are a great place to learn quickly and create something awesome. Submit your hacks in one of the following categories:
hackathon-rules:
All hackers should abide by Major League Hacking's 
.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1 Year Subscription to all Coursera Courses
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Hack from Coursera
Best Web and Mobile App Development Prize from TaxFyle
Best Virtual or Augmented Reality Application with Citrix
Best First Time Hack from Twitter

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Raspberry Pi & PiHut Essential Kit from MLH

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Amazon Web Services

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 3 months of Office Space at CIC’s Life Science Technology Park
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Most Viable Startup with Cambridge Innovation Center (CIC) Miami
Best IoT Hack Using a Qualcomm Device
